title: Madridge Journal of Vaccines
author: Author Matar A; Bizri A; Raslan A; Ibrikji S; Musharrafieh U; Sakr CJ; Mahfoud ZR
description: Madridge Journal of Vaccines mainly deals with clinical/research articles and new methodological clinical access, review articles, editorials in vaccine study & research. This Journal publishes articles on different areas of research like Human Vaccine Trials, Veterinary Vaccines, Cancer Vaccines, Vaccine Adjuvants, Vaccine regulatory issues, Preclinical vaccine studies, Childhood vaccines, HIV vaccines, Hepatitis Vaccines, Malaria vaccines, TB vaccines.
cleaned_text: About Journal Madridge Journal of Vaccines (MJV) is a peer-reviewed and open access journal that publishes original research articles as well as review articles in all areas of vaccines. Madridge Journal of Vaccines mainly deals with clinical/research articles and new methodological clinical access, review articles, editorials in vaccine study & research. This Journal publishes articles on different areas of research like Human Vaccine Trials, Veterinary Vaccines, Cancer Vaccines, Vaccine Adjuvants, Vaccine regulatory issues, Preclinical vaccine studies, Childhood vaccines, HIV vaccines, Hepatitis Vaccines, Malaria vaccines, TB vaccines. Madridge Journal of vaccines Study & Research do not constrain to particular area of research. We aim to bring latest research advancements to a wide international audience on vaccines study & research.
